summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to library facilities; approving and providing for general obligation indebtedness of the City in the form of unlimited tax general obligation bonds, other lawful forms of general obligation indebtedness, or any combination thereof, in one or more series, if and as authorized by the qualified voters of the City at an election therein on November 3, 1998, pursuant to Ordinance 119019, for the purposes of paying part of the costs of library facilities and costs of issuance and sale or execution, delivery, and sale of the evidence of such indebtedness; providing for terms, covenants, and manner of sale of the evidence of such indebtedness; providing for agreements and activities in connection with such indebtedness; and authorizing the creation of a fund.
